resources.string: This is a story about a little sad guy. One day, he called upon a big dragon, wishing he could grant him his wish: to finally be happy. To do so, he will have to gather all 3 sacred crystals: the crystal of health, the crystal of wealth and the crystal of love. He will have to get through difficult tests to get there.
The crystal of wealth is guarded by the troll of the donjon. It would be wise to go get the donjon\'s map to not get lost in these multiple corridors.

You will find te map in the small village\'s market. To fnd the donjon\'s monster, you will need to make your way through intersections respecting the following sequence: Right, Left, Left, Right Are you ready to defeat the donjon\'s troll?
In this forest, you will come face to face with the forest\'s troll. You have now the opportunity to get the crystal of love, although, you are second guessing your ability to win the fight.

The lake\'s troll is the one who has the crystal of health. You will need to face him on his own territory. Without this gems you can say goodbye a happy life. Are you ready to face the lake\'s troll?
Congratulalions. The balls never existed. It was a scam. You can not find happiness. It is already in you. You only need to be able to recognize it.
You are dead. Failing to find the 3 magical balls, left you in a state of despair, loneliness and poverty I few days later yo died from an unknown sickness.
